constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PHILLIPS:
H.R. 2159.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 18 allows Congress to make all
laws ``which shall be necessary and proper for carrying into
execution any ``other'' powers vested by the Constitution in
the Government of the United States.
[Page H1622]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

title: RECYCLE Act
